title: Apple TV+ originals ‘CODA’ and ‘Macbeth’ climb streaming charts after Oscar nominations
content:
The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced earlier this month the nominees for the 2022 Academy Awards, popularly known as The Oscars, and Apple TV+ films received six nominations this year. Following the announcement, Apple Original Films “CODA” and “The Tragedy of Macbeth” returned to the top 10 streaming charts in the US.

more…

The post Apple TV+ originals ‘CODA’ and ‘Macbeth’ climb streaming charts after Oscar nominations appeared first on 9to5Mac.
